full_content: Airmed | Devpost Log in Sign up Join a hackathon Devpost Participate in our public hackathons Hackathons Projects Devpost for Teams Access your company's private hackathons Login Host a hackathon Devpost Grow your developer ecosystem and promote your platform Host a public hackathon Devpost for Teams Drive innovation, collaboration, and retention within your organization Host an internal hackathon By use case AI hackathons Customer hackathons Employee hackathons Public hackathons Resources Blog Insights into hackathon planning and participation Customer stories Inspiration from peers and other industry leaders Planning guides Best practices for planning online and in-person hackathons Webinars & events Upcoming events and on-demand recordings Help desk Common questions and support documentation Join a hackathon Devpost Participate in our public hackathons Hackathons Projects Devpost for Teams Access your company's private hackathons Login Host a hackathon Devpost Grow your developer ecosystem and promote your platform Host a public hackathon Devpost for Teams Drive innovation, collaboration, and retention within your organization Host an internal hackathon By use case AI hackathons Customer hackathons Employee hackathons Public hackathons Resources Blog Insights into hackathon planning and participation Customer stories Inspiration from peers and other industry leaders Planning guides Best practices for planning online and in-person hackathons Webinars & events Upcoming events and on-demand recordings Help desk Common questions and support documentation Log in Sign up Airmed Connecting You With Your Health Like Comment Story Updates Logo Extension in Chrome toolbar Posture alert notification Extension popup Inspiration We ourselves notice that after working for an extended amount of time we started to have bad posture. We wished there was something to help, so we set out to create it ourselves. What it does We created a chrome extension that gives you a notification if you are slouching or don't have good posture. We keep track of your posture score and motivate you to take care of your back! How we built it We used AWS to train and deploy our model. We created a chrome extension with JavaScript, HTML and CSS. Challenges we ran into Setting up AWS and training with SageMaker. Accomplishments that we're proud of Setting up AWS and training with SageMaker. Built With amazon-web-servicesapigatewaycsshtmljavascriptlambdapythonpytorchsagemaker Submitted to HackTheBurgh X Winner HackTheBurgh X Challenge Winner Most Entreprenuerial Potential Created by Extension front-end and integrating with AWS Cameron McClymont Casper Vestergaard Alexander Murphy Like Share this project: Updates Alexander Murphy started this project — Mar 03, 2024 04:40 AM EST Leave feedback in the comments!
